meanings.definition: A person who uses a lasso to catch animals.
meanings.sent1: The lassoers at the rodeo caught the runaway calf.
meanings.sent2: The lassoers practiced their skills on the ranch.
meanings.sent3: The lassoers had a competition to see who could catch the most animals.
meanings.sent4: The lassoers' precision was like a spider spinning its web.
meanings.sent5: The lassoers' ability to catch animals amazed the audience.

meanings.definition: Those who are skilled in the use of a lasso.
meanings.sent1: The skilled lassoers demonstrated their techniques at the show.
meanings.sent2: The lassoers' expertise was evident in their swift movements.
meanings.sent3: The lassoers entertained the crowd with their impressive tricks.
meanings.sent4: The lassoers' accuracy was as sharp as a knife.
meanings.sent5: The lassoers' mastery of the lasso was unmatched.
